name: Los Angeles
description: A major city known for its role in the film and entertainment industry.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **Los Angeles** is a city in California, USA, and is widely recognized as the entertainment capital of the world. It is home to Hollywood, numerous film studios, and entertainment companies, making it a central hub for the film and television industry.

content.title: Film History
content.body: Los Angeles has been the backdrop for countless films and television shows. Some iconic movies filmed here include `Chinatown`, `Pulp Fiction`, and films within the `Batman` franchise. Notable scenes include downtown Los Angeles for futuristic cityscapes and various neighborhoods for diverse cultural settings.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: Los Angeles is highly accessible to the public with many studios offering tours, such as Warner Bros. Studios Burbank and Universal Studios Hollywood. Visitors can also explore iconic locations like the Walk of Fame, the TCL Chinese Theatre, and the Hollywood Sign.
